summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of enhanced Angular ERP dashboard completed successfully. All 17 specified features tested including WebSocket real-time updates, header components, date validation, KPI cards, AI insights panel, mini grids, charts, data grids, and responsive layout. Real-time KPI update verified during testing (Pending Orders: 28,750 â†’ 34,404).

minor_issues.issue: Status indicators not visually apparent on KPI cards
Shows 'LIVE' in caps instead of 'Live' (minor text formatting)

passed_tests: Header shows Kalsofte logo, centered title, and Live indicator
All action buttons (refresh, notifications, settings) present and functional
Filter toolbar with date pickers using correct input type='date'
Date validation works - error shown when From date > To date
Reset button successfully resets date filters
Apply button clickable and triggers date filter action
All 6 KPI Cards display with proper data and trends
WebSocket connection establishes and shows 'Live' status
Real-time KPI updates working - observed Pending Orders update during test
AI Insights panel shows 6 insight cards with icons and timestamps
Non-Moving Items mini grid shows exactly 4 items as specified
Fast-Moving Items mini grid shows exactly 4 items as specified
Line chart (Stock vs Dispatch Trend) renders correctly
Bar chart (Stock Ageing Distribution) renders correctly
Pending Orders data grid displays with 6 data rows
FG Stock Ageing data grid displays with 6 data rows
View All Analytics button present and clickable
Responsive layout works perfectly at 1024px tablet width - all components remain accessible
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (17/17 major features working, 2 minor UI polish items)
